Listo.title: Struggling with decisions?
Listo.text: Whether it's picking a team to win or planning a date or the classic back-and-forth of "Where should we go?" "I don't know, what about you?". We've got you covered.
Listo.stepOne: Write your option in the input field, then click the "Add" button. Don't worry, options can always be removed if necessary.
Listo.stepTwo: Repeat the first step for each option you want to add. Finished? Move on to the last step.
Listo.stepThree: Click the "Ask the Oracle" button. It's easy, isn't it?

Nums.title: Do you believe in the magic of numbers?
Nums.text: Our lives are filled with countless choices. An average adult makes about 35,000 remotely conscious decisions each day. Factors such as stress, fatigue, and time pressure can influence the number and quality of decisions made in a day.
Nums.stepOne: Enter the initial value in the minimum value field. It can be zero but must be less than the maximum value.
Nums.stepTwo: Enter the initial value in the maximum value field. It must be greater than the minimum value.
Nums.stepThree: Click the "Ask the Oracle" button. It's easy, isn't it?

Netflix.title: What's on Tonight? Let's Decide Together!
Netflix.text: Classic back-and-forth of "What should we watch tonight?" "I don't know, what do you want?"
Netflix.stepOne: On this page, you have two options to choose from: the Oracle's Choice and Top Rated. Decide how you want to search for a movie today.
Netflix.stepTwo: Oracle's Choice: Select one or more genres, or leave the field empty for a genreless search. Then, enter the release year of the films. For Top Rated, simply proceed to the next step.
Netflix.stepThree: Click the "Ask the Oracle" button, and don't forget to read the movie details!
